D3G.F.summary: Despegar.com, Corp., online travel company, provides a range of travel and travel-related products through its websites and mobile applications in Latin America. The company operates through two segments, Air; and Packages, Hotels and Other Travel Products. It offers airline tickets, packages, hotels, and other travel-related products, which enable consumers to find, compare, plan, and purchase travel products through its marketplace under the Despegar and Decolar brands. The company provides a technology platform for its travel suppliers to manage the distribution of their products. Despegar.com, Corp. was founded in 1999 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

DOME.BA.long_name: DOMEC Compañía de Artefactos Domésticos S.A.I.C.y F.
DOME.BA.summary: DOMEC CompaÃ±Ã­a de Artefactos DomÃ©sticos S.A.I.C.y F. manufactures and sells gas stoves in Argentina. It provides kitchens, ovens, anafes, purifiers, water tanks and heaters, and bells. The company was founded in 1948 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

FIPL.BA.summary: Fiplasto S.A. produces and sells hardboard and furniture. It offers a range of products for industry, construction, and home purpose, including chapadur, blackboards, floors, decorative plates, doors, boards, partitions, and various furniture for home environment; and furniture for bedroom, living, bathroom, kitchen, and offices. The company also provides vinyl floors, pre-assembled components, and housing solutions. Fiplasto S.A. offers its products in Argentina, Germany, Belize, Bolivia, Canada, Chile, China, Costa Rica, Ecuador, El Salvador, Scotland, Spain, the United States, the Philippines, Guatemala, England, Jamaica, Panama, Paraguay, Puerto Rico, Dominican Republic, and Uruguay. Fiplasto S.A. was founded in 1945 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

GRIM.BA.summary: Grimoldi S.A. manufactures and sells footwear, accessories, and dress items for men, women, and children. The company offers flip flops, tacos, clogs, ballerinas and loafers, Texans, borcegos, boots, shoes, sneakers, etc. It also provides accessories, including wallets, handbags, backpacks, warm hats, gloves, hats, outdoor backpacks, and luggage; and dresses, such as t-shirts, divers, polar, vests, jackets, pants, hose, bermuda shorts and muscular, and shirts. The company offers its products under the Hush Puppies, The North Face, Caterpillar, Grimoldi, Timberland, apie, CAT, ALDO, Merrell, Van's, and various other brands through its website and telephone. Grimoldi S.A. was founded in 1895 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

HAVA.BA.summary: Havanna Holding S.A. operates a chain of coffee shops in Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Chile, Spain, the United States, Paraguay, Peru, Venezuela, and Ecuador. The company's cafes offer various coffee; and cookies, chocolates, and caramel products. It operates approximately 270 coffee shops. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

LONG.BA.summary: Longvie S.A. produces and sells household appliances in Argentina. It offers washing machines, dishwashers, stoves, ovens, water heaters, hot water tanks, and heaters, as well as air purification equipment. The company also exports its products to South America, the United States, Europe, and Asia. Longvie S.A. was founded in 1918 and is based in Villa Martelli, Argentina.

MELI.BA.summary: MercadoLibre, Inc. operates online commerce platforms in Latin America. It operates Mercado Libre Marketplace, an automated online commerce platform that enables businesses, merchants, and individuals to list merchandise and conduct sales and purchases online; and Mercado Pago FinTech, a financial technology solution platform, which facilitates transactions on and off its marketplaces by providing a mechanism that allows its users to send and receive payments online, as well as allows  users  to transfer money via their websites and mobile apps. The company also offers Mercado Fondo that allows users to invest funds deposited in their Mercado Pago accounts; and Mercado Credito that extends loans to certain merchants and consumers. In addition, it provides Mercado Envios logistics solution that enables sellers on its platform to utilize third-party carriers and other logistics service providers, as well as fulfillment and warehousing services for sellers. Further, the company provides Mercado Libre Classifieds, an online classified listing service, where users can list and purchase motor vehicles, real estate, and services. Additionally, it offers Mercado Ads, an advertising platform, which enables large retailers and brands to promote their products and services on the Internet. The company also provides Mercado Shops, an online storefronts solution, that enables users to set-up, manage, and promote their own Webstores. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

MIRG.BA.long_name: Mirgor Sociedad Anónima, Comercial, Industrial, Financiera, Inmobiliaria y Agropecuaria
MIRG.BA.summary: Mirgor Sociedad AnÃ³nima, Comercial, Industrial, Financiera, Inmobiliaria y Agropecuaria engages in the agriculture, innovation, manufacturing, retail, distribution, and logistics businesses in Argentina. It also operates Diggit, an online store. Mirgor Sociedad AnÃ³nima, Comercial, Industrial, Financiera, Inmobiliaria y Agropecuaria was founded in 1983 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

PATA.BA.long_name: Sociedad Anónima Importadora y Exportadora de la Patagonia
PATA.BA.summary: Sociedad AnÃ³nima Importadora y Exportadora de la Patagonia operates supermarkets in Argentina. Its supermarkets offer food, personal care, and children other products. The company was founded in 1908 and is headquartered in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
